byline.contributor: Andrew Roth contributed reporting from Kharkiv, Ukraine, and Peter Baker from Washington.

abstract: Prominent Russian opposition leader Boris Y Nemtsov is shot dead in central Moscow; it is highest-profile assassination in Russia that has occurred during tenure of Pres Vladimir V Putin, who condemns killing; Nemtsov had been organizing rally to protest war in Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Nemtsov, a former first deputy prime minister of Russia, was killed in central Moscow in the highest-profile assassination in Russia during the tenure of President Vladimir V. Putin.

headline.main: Boris Nemtsov, Putin Foe, Is Shot Dead in Shadow of Kremlin
headline.print_headline: Putin Foe Shot in the Shadow of the Kremlin

snippet: Mr. Nemtsov, a former first deputy prime minister of Russia, was killed in central Moscow in the highest-profile assassination in Russia during the tenure of President Vladimir V. Putin.
